contributions: Developed two cross-platform healthcare mobile applications using React Native, with a focus on personalized nutrition and user health tracking.
Implemented scalable backend APIs using Python, Node.js, and Firebase Functions, enabling real-time data handling and secure user authentication.
Handled mobile DevOps responsibilities, including provisioning certificates, managing App Store and Google Play releases, and troubleshooting deployment issues across platforms.
Led mobile and web application development across four enterprise-level projects using React Native, React.js, Next.js, and Node.js, delivering performant, maintainable, and scalable applications.
Developed robust front-end features and cross-platform mobile components with TypeScript, JavaScript, and modern state management libraries like Redux, MobX, and MST.
Architected CI/CD pipelines using Vercel, Bitrise, AppCenter, and Fastlane to streamline development, testing, and deployment workflows for both Android and iOS platforms.
Developed and maintained core functionality for multiple crossplatform mobile applications using React Native, supporting both iOS and Android ecosystems.
Integrated and maintained RESTful APIs, ensuring consistent data flow and efficient client-server communication.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines with Bitrise, AppCenter, and Fastlane to automate build, test, and release processes.
Integrated third-party analytics, error tracking, and monetization tools including Amplitude, Sentry, and RevenueCat.
Built user interfaces and mobile experiences using React.js, React Native, Java, and Swift, ensuring cross-platform functionality and a consistent user experience.
Designed and implemented application architecture and UI components for both iOS and Android platforms, using Objective-C, Java, and Redux for efficient state management.
Developed and integrated RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express, and managed backend services with MongoDB and MySQL databases.

Built native applications using Objective-C, Swift, and Java, enabling users to create and share posts, like and comment, connect with other users, engage in private messaging, and configure push notification settings.
Collaborated on the transition of some projects to React Native and React.js, contributing reusable components and optimizing cross-platform performance.
Utilized Node.js, JavaScript, and JSON for backend integration and data formatting.
